explains: adj. 清洁的；有去污作用的
n. 彻底清洁；洗清；清洁霜
v. 清洗；净化；免除（某人）的罪过；治愈（cleanse 的现在分词）
wordGroup: ethnic cleansing n. 种族清洗
cleansing foam 洁面泡沫；洗面乳

sentences.en: Sales of cleansing milks, creams, and gels have doubled over the past decade.
sentences.cn: 在过去10年中，洁面乳、面霜以及发胶的销售已经增长了一倍。

sentences.en: No amount of cleansing or mineral water consumption can guarantee a clear skin.
sentences.cn: 再多的洁肤和矿泉水的消耗都不能确保光洁的皮肤。

sentences.en: In late May, government forces began the "ethnic cleansing" of the area around the town.
sentences.cn: 5月下旬，政府军队开始了对该镇周边地区的“种族清洗”。
